title: Ep. 577 - Everybody’s Been Woked
description:
Joe Biden mutters incoherently, Don Lemon shows us why the Left can’t meme, and the Supreme Court magnanimously allows a group of nuns to pray another day.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvC
